author: @fermion4945
text: Data analysis is a small part of data science .Data science is a big domain. In data analytics, you take raw data and transform it into insights which helps businesses in better decision making. But in data science ,you analyze the data and based on the insights and trends that you recognize using the data ,you apply ML algorithms and build predictive models to predict the future .Remember ,data analysis and data science are both used to solve a particular business problem.
